mapper.sql: SELECT goods.id,goods.shopId, goods.`serverName`,goods.classify, goods.brand,goods.capacity, goods.weight,goods.unit, goods.p1,goods.p2,goods.p3, goods.count,goods.price, goods.image,goods.isDelete, goods.`describe`,goods.isDelete, goods.delReason,shop.shopName, shop.address AS shopAddress, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM orderdetail WHERE orderdetail.targetId = goods.id AND orderdetail.type = 1 ) AS sales, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM collect WHERE collect.targetId = goods.id AND collect.type = 1 ) AS collect FROM goods LEFT JOIN shop ON goods.shopId = shop.id
